title: New PANDEMO 350 Mountain e-Bike
text: Winter Special Offer!As seen in the February edition of the GETAWAY. Pandemo 350 is brand new and the best value for e-bikes currently on the SA e-bike market. It is a rugged mountain e-bike designed for beginner and interim cyclists, and available in different sizes to suit all cyclists, young and old.Its great features include 5 different assistance levels, supplied by a powerful 350-watt motor housed in the rear wheel hub, a Shimano 21-gear set, and a 36-volt long lasting lithium-ion battery.A bright LED light is standard equipment. The LCD screen is illuminated to facilitate night cycling, and provides essential cumulative and trip data including speed, distance, time, battery condition and instantaneous power consumption. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the balanced, smooth-riding confidence of larger diameter 29-inch wheels. The new SyncDrive Pro motor delivers 80Nm of torque with 360 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The RideControl ONE integrated handlebar support buttons offer ergonomic control, and the EnergyPak 500Wh battery system lets you extend the ride. title: 2017 SPECIALIZED Enduro Comp 29/6Fattie
text:
Negotiable 


Perfect trail bike. Reason for selling : not using it. 
Bike hasn’t done 800km basically still brand new. 
Have a set of scott shoes number 10 (bought it for R5000) and a trail helmet (bought it for R4000) that i will add.

Large frame






FEATURES




Enduro Comp 29/6Fattie
The frame has an X-Wing layout with an M5 alloy construction. Together, these elements combine to form the perfect balance of efficiency, weight savings, and unparalleled strength. It's also been built off our 29 Geometry, which lends itself to running 6Fattie wheels and tires (only a 7mm BB drop), in order to provide an aggressive, well-rounded ride. And with internal routing and a return to a threaded bottom bracket, you get a bike that's clean, dependable, and ready for anything that the trail has to offer.
RockShox Yari RC fork features a 15x110mm Maxle Ultimate thru-axle, a Solo Air™ spring, and 160mm of plush travel to take on big hits and bumpy terrain with supreme speed and efficiency.
SRAM's 11-speed GX rear derailleur serves up powerful and precise one-by shifting, so you can say goodbye to dropped chains and unecessary grams. 
BIKE SPECS...
FRAME
M5 alloy, X-wing layout, All-Mountain Geometry, threaded BB, internal cable routing, ManFu link, oversized pivot bearings, 12x148mm dropouts, replaceable derailleur hanger, 165mm of travel
FORK
RockShox Yari 29/27.5+, Solo Air, rebound & compression adjust, 15x110mm Maxle Ultimate thru-axle, 160mm travel
REAR SHOCK
RockShox Monarch Plus, Rx All-Mountain Tune, AUTOSAG, rebound and 3-position compression adjust, 216x57mm
FRONT HUB
Specialized disc, alloy, sealed cartridge bearings,15x110mm thru-axle, 24h
REAR HUB
Specialized disc, alloy, sealed cartridge bearings, 12x148mm thru-axle, 28h
SPOKES
DT Swiss Industry, stainless, 3x, 2.0"
RIMS
Roval Traverse 29, hookless alloy, 29mm inner width, 24/28h, tubeless ready
INNER TUBES
29x1.75/2.4", 60mm Presta valve
FRONT TIRE
Butcher, GRID casing, 29x2.3", 60TPI, Aramid folding bead, 2Bliss Ready
REAR TIRE
Slaughter, GRID casing, 29x2.3", 60TPI, Aramid folding bead, 2Bliss Ready
CRANKSET
RaceFace Aeffect, 6000-series alloy, 24mm spindle, 52mm chainline, 28T
SHIFT LEVERS
SRAM NX, 11-speed, trigger
REAR DERAILLEUR
SRAM GX, long cage, 11-speed
CASSETTE
SRAM XG-1150, 11-speed, 10-42t
CHAIN
SRAM PC-1110, 11-speed w/PowerLink
FRONT BRAKE
SRAM Guide R, hydraulic disc, organic pads, Guide S4 4-piston caliper, 200mm rotor
REAR BRAKE
SRAM Guide R, hydraulic disc, organic pads, Guide S4 4-piston caliper, 180mm rotor
HANDLEBARS
Specialized DH, 6061 alloy, 6-degree upsweep, 8-degree backsweep, 27mm rise, 780mm width
GRIPS
Specialized Sip Grip, half-waffle, S/M: regular thickness, L/XL: XL thickness
STEM
Specialized Trail, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt, 6-degree rise
SADDLE
Body Geometry Henge Comp, hollow Cr-Mo rails, 143mm
SEATPOST
Command Post IRcc, 12 position micro-height adjustable, alien head design, bottom mount cable routing, remote adjust SRL lever, 30.9mm, S: 100mm, M/L/XL: 125mm travel
SEAT BINDER
Specialized, alloy, 2-bolt, 27.2mm

title: Titan Team Carbon 29er, Large Frame, Deore XT 10spd, RockShox, Tubeles
text:

-Large Carbon Fibre Titan Team lightweight and strong frame
-RockShox RL solo air Shocks with remote lockout
-Shimano Deore XT 10 x 3 speed rapid fire shifters
-Shimano Deore XT (Pro-Grade) alloy crankset with sealed bearing BB
-Shimano Deore XT rear and front deraileurs
-WTB double walled alloy rims with Alloy hubs
-Maxxis Crossmark tubeless tyres
-Xmission Carbon Saddle post, alloy clamp, Prologo Kappa Evo saddle

-Shimano Hydraulic Disk Brakes with 180mm rotors each front and back

title: Specialized S Works Stumpjumper 2017
text:
FACT 11m carbon fibre Trail Chassis with Stumpjumper FSR full carbon rear end blends stiffness with light weight to form the pinnacle of efficiency, while fully enclosed cable routing and an integrated SWAT™ Door create exceptional handling and zero-hassle storage.
The Öhlins RXF 36 fork was designed to be the gold standard in frontend suspension. It operates off of a three-chamber air spring design (two positive and one negative), and it utilizes proprietary TTX damping technology. Combined, this allows both parallel and separated oil flow that controls the overall pressure levels. 
Roval Traverse SL 29 carbon wheels are the ultimate in lightweight rolling stock for the trail. They're built to take a hit, and they feature a wide rim width that boosts handling and stability over any kind of terrain.

The bike was meticulously maintained and has done about 1500km. 

Bike is a Large frame.

title: E-Bike Smart Mercedes Electric City Bike
text: it's fitted with some very sophisticated features which include the silent gearless hub motor from BionX with four levels of assist and regen mode plus regenerative braking, Gates carbon belt drive, Sram three speed internal hub gears and Magura hydraulic disc brakes.The 250 watts BionX hub motor has a powerful 35 Newton meters of torque. Combined with a high power 48 volt 8.8 amp hour battery, it gives a very reassuring pedal assist to the rider.Comes with 2 battery packs, charger, the optional Smart rear rack with built in panniers (easy to remove) and original full length mud guards.The bicycle only came in one size, which is medium.Very nice ride, it feels like a high quality sports hybrid with seamless electric power. It rolls along with confidence and with super strong Magura hydraulic disc brakes. Welcome to come and viewLocal delivery possiblePlease note this is a private sale and cash on collection only

title: B'n B'nB? BED, BREAKFAST AND BICYCLE!
text: Come for a stay at Thrush Nest - have a wonderful sleep at our b&b, enjoy a hearty breakfast, and we will escort you to Giba Gorge Mountain Bike Park! If there was an MTB heaven, then this would be it! - beginner rides, moderate rides, extreme rides, bmx track, medical standby, bike repair techhies on hand, great restaurant, beautiful picnic spots in the lush sub-tropical bush, with waterfalls, rivers, and wonderful scenic walks. Only 6km from our BnB, Bring your bike or hire one there. Entrance - non rider - R20-00, Own bike - R80-00, Child - own bike - R50-00 . Basic MTB hire - R200-00 for 2 hours - prices vary depending on your requirements - payment at park..BnB: R750-00 per room per night with English breakfast.

Independent test:
The bearings will spin smoothly for over a decade for most users and they are nearly indestructible. Seals are very good and keep the dirt and water out. They are reasonable weight and the solid design can outlast most bikes.

title: Motorized bikes
text:
A standard bicycle fitted with an 49cc or 66/80cc, 1.7kW Motor.

Fitted with a 2l petrol tank capable of delivering an estimated range of 90km’s.

The bicycle, with its small engine capacity, still qualifies as a bicycle, which means no licensing or roadworthy certificate are required.

The bicycle is able to effectively operate with a person weighing up to 115kg and is estimated to reach 40km/h.

This is a cost effective innovation which I believe will be perfect for visual patrolling and rapid/easy response just about anywhere, requiring very little maintenance.

The engine is fitted with a magneto, which can be utilized to power up lights if necessary.

We can supply complete bicycles to suit your needs or modify your current bicycle to your specifications.

These bicycles are extremely easy to use and operates with a clutch system similar to that of a motorcycle.

Replacement parts are readily available.

For more information, please don’t hesitate to call me 0717156081

title: New PANDEMO 350 Mountain e-Bike
text: Winter Special Offer!As seen in the February edition of the GETAWAY. Pandemo 350 is brand new and the best value for e-bikes currently on the SA e-bike market. It is a rugged mountain e-bike designed for beginner and interim cyclists, and available in different sizes to suit all cyclists, young and old.Its great features include 5 different assistance levels, supplied by a powerful 350-watt motor housed in the rear wheel hub, a Shimano 21-gear set, and a 36-volt long lasting lithium-ion battery.A bright LED light is standard equipment. The LCD screen is illuminated to facilitate night cycling, and provides essential cumulative and trip data including speed, distance, time, battery condition and instantaneous power consumption. Plus, you’ll always feel safe on these great bikes knowing that Tektro 160 front and rear disks are fitted!Regular price R26,900. Order yours now for only R24,900 and save!Great e-bikes and scooters from SA Ebikes. Visit our website at www.saebikes.com for more information, and to place your order now!WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE
